content.text: Match ends, Sporting Lisbon 1, Juventus 1.
Second Half ends, Sporting Lisbon 1, Juventus 1.
Foul by Blaise Matuidi (Juventus).
Gelson Martins (Sporting Lisbon) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcos Acuña (Sporting Lisbon).
Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Sporting Lisbon. Radosav Petrovic replaces Stefan Ristovski because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Foul by Douglas Costa (Juventus).

Marcos Acuña (Sporting Lisbon) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Foul by Juan Cuadrado (Juventus).

Attempt missed. Douglas Costa (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic following a corner.
Corner,  Juventus. Conceded by André Pinto.
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Higuaín (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Blaise Matuidi with a headed pass.
Sebastián Coates (Sporting Lisbon) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Sporting Lisbon 1, Juventus 1. Gonzalo Higuaín (Juventus) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juan Cuadrado with a through ball.
Marcos Acuña (Sporting Lisbon) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Marcos Acuña (Sporting Lisbon).
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) wins a free kick on the right wing.
